items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a cable or resistance band in both hands at chest height.
Step forward with your right foot and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is hovering just above the floor.
As you lunge forward, extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping the cable taut.
Push off your right foot to return to the starting position, bringing your arms back to your chest.
Repeat on the other side, stepping forward with your left foot.
Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.
Strengthens the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves
Targets the core muscles for added stability
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
